name: ● Galaxy Explorer ●
description:
● Galaxy Explorer ●

==========================

Welcome to Galaxy Explorer, my latest game!

Hello there young planet... It's your turn to explore the Galaxy...

==========================

-Made for @FreezingField's 1.2k Game Contest.

-Also made for SDS Theme - Somewhere Out There.==========================

★ Instructions ★

      ● Move with arrows keys or wasd.

      ● Shoot with space bar

      ● Get the highest score!

      ● Have fun!

==========================
